patterns: How long does delivery take?
How long does shipping take?

Why is my order not delivered yet
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days. Please bear with us!
Shipping takes 2-4 days.  Please bear with us!

patterns: My payment was processed successfully but I didn't get any order confirmation. What should I do?
Payment was completed but no confirmation
Order was not confirmed
Money deducted but order is not confirmed
responses: Daraz sends you an Email & SMS upon confirmation of your order. If it requires manual confirmation, our team will contact you within 24 hours after order placement. Delay in confirmation SMS may occur due to network error, you may receive it with a delay.
It takes upto 24 hours for confirmation, please bear with us! Type Need more help for more assistance.

patterns: Why is my order delayed?
Did my order get delayed?
Why is my order not delivered yet?
When do I get my delivery?
responses: We are really sorry if there has been a delay in your order! If your order is within delivery period, We recommend you to please wait during this period since our Delivery Heroes make 3 attempts to deliver your order!
If your order is past up to 3 days after delivery period, There may be logistic issues causing a delay in delivery. Please type 'Common reasons for delivery delay' to know more about this.
We appreciate if you could wait for your items as most orders are delivered successfully within this period.
If your order is past more than 3 days, Since there may be unexpected issues causing delivery delays, you can click on 'Need more Help' for further assistance.

patterns: Common reasons for delivery delay
common reasons for delivery delay
reasons for delay
delivery delay
responses: Reasons include Seller Sourcing Issues, Courier Issues, Cross Border shipment delay, Wrong Address or Phone Number, and Unavailability of Customer.

How to contact a seller
responses: Contact us for further information on our helpline. Timings are from 09:00 AM to 05:00 PM from Monday to Saturday.

Visit my orders page to check status of specific orders.

patterns: How long do return items take
When will my items be returned
When can I get a refund for return items?
Are refunds available for return?
responses: Return takes 6 to 10 business days. There are 2 parts to the return process. In the first part, we check the items received from you to verify the issue highlighted in your return claim. Once we've verified and accepted your return, we initiate the refund process which takes 1 business day for Daraz wallet and 2-10 business days for bank or card.

patterns: How to withdraw refunds from wallet?
Withdraw funds
Can I withdraw refunds
responses: Withdrawing refunds from your wallet is very easy. Please follow the steps below: Step 1: Click on the 'Wallet' icon on the top right corner of the Daraz App, or click here. Step 2: Click on the 'Balance Details' Icon. Step 3: Click on 'Withdraw' button. Step 4: Enter your bank account details and click 'Withdraw'. Step 5: You will receive a verification email, click confirm to initiate your withdrawal request.

patterns: What is my order status
I want to know my return status
How to return status
responses: Please visit the My Orders page for a list of your confirmed orders.

patterns: How to use a voucher?
Can I use a voucher?
How to use a voucher?
responses: You can add a voucher by clicking on My Cart > Check Out > Enter Voucher Code > APPLY.

patterns: How can I change my profile information
I want to change my password
I want to change my phone number
I want to change my address
I want to Reset my password
I want to delete my account
delete my account
responses: You can easily add or change your account details by following the steps below: Step 1: Click on 'Account', Step 2: Click on 'Manage my account' from the icon, Step 3: You change or edit your name, address, email address, mobile number, etc., Step 4: Fill in the required details, and click on Save. Note: You can also change your delivery address from the Checkout page before proceeding to pay.

patterns: Can I download a mobile app for this?
Mobile app
Download mobile app
responses: You can download the Daraz Mobile App from both IOS App Store, and Google Play Store.

patterns: How can I create an account?
How to create account?
responses: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the top right corner of our website and follow the instructions to complete the registration process.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal as payment methods for online orders.

patterns: How can I track my order?
responses: You can track your order by logging into your account and navigating to the 'Order History' section. There, you will find the tracking information for your shipment.

patterns: What is your return policy?
responses: Our return policy allows you to return products within 30 days of purchase for a full refund, provided they are in their original condition and packaging. Please refer to our Returns page for detailed instructions.

patterns: Can I cancel my order?
responses: You can cancel your order if it has not been shipped yet. Please contact our customer support team with your order details, and we will assist you with the cancellation process.

patterns: How long does shipping take?
responses: Shipping times vary depending on the destination and the shipping method chosen. Standard shipping usually takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping can take 1-2 business days.

patterns: Do you offer international shipping?
responses: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. The availability and shipping costs will be calculated during the checkout process based on your location.

patterns: What should I do if my package is lost or damaged?
responses: If your package is lost or damaged during transit, please contact our customer support team immediately. We will initiate an investigation and take the necessary steps to resolve the issue.

patterns: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
responses: If you need to change your shipping address, please contact our customer support team as soon as possible. We will do our best to update the address if the order has not been shipped yet.

patterns: How can I contact customer support?
responses: You can contact our customer support team by phone at [phone number] or by email at [email address]. Our team is available [working hours] to assist you with any inquiries or issues you may have.

patterns: Do you offer gift wrapping services?
responses: Yes, we offer gift wrapping services for an additional fee. During the checkout process, you can select the option to add gift wrapping to your order.

patterns: What is your price matching policy?
responses: We have a price matching policy where we will match the price of an identical product found on a competitor's website. Please contact our customer support team with the details of the product and the competitor's offer.

patterns: Can I order by phone?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not accept orders over the phone. Please place your order through our website for a smooth and secure transaction.

patterns: Are my personal and payment details secure?
responses: Yes, we take the security of your personal and payment details seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and follow strict security protocols to ensure your information is protected.

patterns: What is your price adjustment policy?
responses: If a product you purchased goes on sale within 7 days of your purchase, we offer a one-time price adjustment. Please contact our customer support team with your order details to request the adjustment.

patterns: Do you have a loyalty program?
responses: Yes, we have a loyalty program where you can earn points for every purchase. These points can be redeemed for discounts on future orders. Please visit our website to learn more and join the program.

patterns: Can I order without creating an account?
responses: Yes, you can place an order as a guest without creating an account. However, creating an account offers benefits such as order tracking and easier future purchases.

patterns: Do you offer bulk or wholesale discounts?
responses: Yes, we offer bulk or wholesale discounts for certain products. Please contact our customer support team or visit our Wholesale page for more information and to discuss your specific requirements.

patterns: Can I change or cancel an item in my order?
responses: If you need to change or cancel an item in your order, please contact our customer support team as soon as possible. We will assist you with the necessary steps.

patterns: How can I leave a product review?
responses: To leave a product review, navigate to the product page on our website and click on the 'Write a Review' button. You can share your feedback and rating based on your experience with the product.

patterns: Can I use multiple promo codes on a single order?
responses: Usually, only one promo code can be applied per order. During the checkout process, enter the promo code in the designated field to apply the discount to your order.

patterns: What should I do if I receive the wrong item?
responses: If you receive the wrong item in your order, please contact our customer support team immediately. We will arrange for the correct item to be shipped to you and assist with returning the wrong item.

patterns: Do you offer expedited shipping?
responses: Yes, we offer expedited shipping options for faster delivery. During the checkout process, you can select the desired expedited shipping method.

patterns: Can I order a product that is out of stock?
responses: If a product is currently out of stock, you will usually see an option to sign up for product notifications. This way, you will be alerted when the product becomes available again.

patterns: What is your email newsletter about?
responses: Our email newsletter provides updates on new product releases, exclusive offers, and helpful tips related to our products. You can subscribe to our newsletter on our website.

patterns: Can I return a product if I changed my mind?
responses: Yes, you can return a product if you changed your mind. Please ensure the product is in its original condition and packaging, and refer to our return policy for instructions.

patterns: Do you offer live chat support?
responses: Yes, we offer live chat support on our website during our business hours. Look for the chat icon in the bottom right corner to initiate a chat with our customer support team.

patterns: Can I order a product as a gift?
responses: Yes, you can order a product as a gift and have it shipped directly to the recipient. During the checkout process, you can enter the recipient's shipping address.

patterns: What should I do if my discount code is not working?
responses: If your discount code is not working, please double-check the terms and conditions associated with the code. If the issue persists, contact our customer support team for assistance.

patterns: Can I return a product if it was a final sale item?
responses: Final sale items are usually non-returnable and non-refundable. Please review the product description or contact our customer support team to confirm the return eligibility for specific items.

patterns: Do you offer installation services for your products?
responses: Installation services are available for select products. Please check the product description or contact our customer support team for more information and to request installation services.

patterns: Can I order a product that is discontinued?
responses: Discontinued products are no longer available for purchase. We recommend exploring alternative products on our website.

patterns: Can I return a product without a receipt?
responses: A receipt or proof of purchase is usually required for returns. Please refer to our return policy or contact our customer support team for assistance.

intents.tag: order for delivery to different country
patterns: Can I order a product for delivery to a different country?
responses: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. Please review the available shipping destinations during checkout or contact our customer support for assistance.

patterns: Can I add a gift message to my order?
responses: Yes, you can add a gift message during the checkout process. There is usually a section where you can enter your personalized message.

patterns: Can I request a product demonstration before making a purchase?
responses: We do not currently offer product demonstrations before purchase. However, you can find detailed product descriptions, specifications, and customer reviews on our website.

patterns: Can I order a product that is listed as 'coming soon'?
responses: Products listed as 'coming soon' are not available for immediate purchase. Please sign up for notifications to be informed when the product becomes available again.

patterns: Can I request an invoice for my order?
responses: Yes, an invoice is usually included with your order. If you require a separate invoice, please contact our customer support team with your order details.

patterns: Can I order a product that is labeled as 'limited edition'?
responses: 'Limited edition' products may have restricted availability. We recommend placing an order as soon as possible to secure your item.

patterns: Can I return a product if I no longer have the original packaging?
responses: While returning a product in its original packaging is preferred, you can still initiate a return without it. Contact our customer support team for guidance in such cases.

patterns: Can I request a product that is out of stock to be reserved for me?
responses: We do not offer reservations for out-of-stock products. However, you can sign up for product notifications to be alerted when the item becomes available again.

intents.tag: order with mix of pre-order and in-stock items
patterns: Can I order a product that is listed as 'pre-order' with other in-stock items?
responses: Yes, you can place an order with a mix of pre-order and in-stock items. However, please note that the entire order will be shipped once all items are available.

patterns: Can I return a product if it was damaged during shipping?
responses: If your product was damaged during shipping, please contact our customer support team immediately. We will guide you through the return and replacement process.

patterns: Can I request a product that is out of stock to be restocked?
responses: We strive to restock popular products whenever possible. Please sign up for product notifications to be informed when the item becomes available again.

patterns: Can I order a product if it is listed as 'backordered'?
responses: Products listed as 'backordered' are temporarily out of stock but can still be ordered. Your order will be fulfilled once the product is restocked.

patterns: Can I return a product if it was purchased with a discount code?
responses: Yes, you can return a product purchased with a discount code. The refund will be processed based on the amount paid after the discount.

patterns: Can I request a custom order or personalized product?
responses: We do not currently offer custom orders or personalized products. Please explore the available products on our website.

patterns: Can I order a product if it is listed as 'temporarily unavailable'?
responses: If a product is listed as 'temporarily unavailable,' it is out of stock but may be restocked in the future. Please check back later or sign up for notifications.

intents.tag: return damaged due to improper use
patterns: Can I return a product if it was damaged due to improper use?
responses: Our return policy generally covers products that are defective or damaged upon arrival. Damage due to improper use may not be eligible for a return. Please contact our customer support team for assistance.

intents.tag: coming soon not available for pre-order
patterns: Can I request a product if it is listed as 'coming soon' but not available for pre-order?
responses: If a product is listed as 'coming soon' but not available for pre-order, you will need to wait until it is officially released and becomes available for purchase.

patterns: Can I order a product if it is listed as 'out of stock' but available for backorder?
responses: If a product is listed as 'out of stock' but available for backorder, you can place an order to secure your item. The product will be shipped once it becomes available.

patterns: Can I return a product if it was purchased with a promotional gift card?
responses: Yes, you can return a product purchased with a promotional gift card. The refund will be issued in the form of store credit or a new gift card.

patterns: Can I request a product if it is not currently available in my preferred color?
responses: If a product is not available in your preferred color, it may be temporarily out of stock. Please check back later or sign up for color notifications.

patterns: Can I order a product if it is listed as 'coming soon' and available for pre-order?
responses: If a product is listed as 'coming soon' and available for pre-order, you can place an order to secure your item before it becomes available.

patterns: Can I return a product if it was purchased during a promotional event?
responses: Yes, you can return a product purchased during a promotional event. The refund will be processed based on the amount paid after any applicable discounts.

patterns: What's the status of my order?
Where is my order?
Can you check my order status?
responses: Sure, please provide your order number and I'll check the status for you.
To check the status of your order, I'll need your order number.
Let me look up your order status. Please provide your order number.

I'm interested in learning about [product category].
What are the specifications of [product name]?
responses: Sure, let me fetch the details for you. What specific information are you looking for?
I can provide you with details such as specifications, features, and availability. What do you need to know?
For detailed information about a product, please provide the product name or category.

patterns: How do I return an item?
What's your return policy?
Can I get a refund for a damaged item?
responses: Our return policy allows returns within [number] days of delivery. Please provide details of your issue for further assistance.
We're sorry to hear about the issue. Please provide your order number and a brief description of the problem to initiate the return process.
Returns and refunds are processed according to our policy. Please provide the necessary details for us to assist you further.

patterns: Do you have any ongoing promotions?
Are there any discounts available?
Can I apply a coupon code to my order?
responses: Yes, we often have promotions running. You can check our website or subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates.
Discounts may be available on certain products or during special events. Keep an eye out for banners or messages indicating discounts.
If you have a valid coupon code, you can apply it during the checkout process to avail the discount.

patterns: How can I contact customer support?
Is there a helpline I can call?
I need assistance with an issue.
responses: You can reach our customer support team through live chat on our website, or by email.
Our customer support team is available 24/7 days of week, to assist you with any issues or queries.
If you need immediate assistance, you can call our helpline during business hours.

patterns: What should I do if my order arrives damaged?
My order arrived damaged, what now?
Who do I contact if my order is damaged?
I have a damaged order, what should I do?
Who do I contact if my order wrong?
responses: If your order arrives damaged, please contact our customer support team immediately.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please get in touch with our customer support team regarding your damaged order.
To address any issues with a damaged order, reach out to our customer support team, and they will assist you promptly.

patterns: How do I choose the right product?
What factors should I consider when selecting a product?
Can you recommend a product for outdoor activities?
responses: When selecting a product, consider factors such as durability, size, weight, and intended use.
Our customer support team can help you choose the right product based on your preferences and requirements.
For outdoor activities, we recommend products that are weather-resistant, lightweight, and have long battery life.

patterns: Can you compare hiking boots and running shoes?
What are the differences between iPhone 12 and Samsung Galaxy S21?
Which camera is better for beginners, Canon EOS Rebel T7 or Nikon D3500?
responses: Here's a comparison of hiking boots and running shoes based on comfort, support, and traction.
The iPhone 12 and Samsung Galaxy S21 differ in terms of operating system, camera features, and design.
Both the Canon EOS Rebel T7 and Nikon D3500 are great cameras for beginners, but the Canon offers more autofocus points while the Nikon has a longer battery life.

patterns: Where can I find reviews for camping tents?
Are there any customer reviews for the Instant Pot?
What do customers think about the latest fitness tracker?
responses: You can find reviews for camping tents on our website under the product page.
Customers have praised the Instant Pot for its versatility and ease of use.
The latest fitness tracker has received positive reviews for its accuracy, battery life, and tracking features.

patterns: How do I choose the right product?
responses: When selecting a product, consider factors such as durability, size, weight, and intended use.

patterns: Can you compare hiking boots and running shoes?
responses: Here's a comparison of hiking boots and running shoes based on comfort, support, and traction.

patterns: Where can I find reviews for camping tents?
responses: You can find reviews for camping tents on our website under the product page.

patterns: Is the Xbox Series X compatible with my TV?
responses: Yes, the Xbox Series X is compatible with most modern TVs that have an HDMI port.

patterns: How do I use this blender?
responses: To use the blender, simply add ingredients, secure the lid, and select the desired speed.

patterns: How should I clean this stainless steel water bottle?
responses: To clean the stainless steel water bottle, hand wash with mild soap and water and let it air dry.

patterns: Can I return this dress if it doesn't fit?
responses: Yes, you can return the dress within 30 days of purchase for a full refund or exchange.

patterns: Is this book currently in stock?
responses: Yes, the book is currently in stock and available for immediate delivery.

patterns: Can I customize this laptop?
responses: Yes, we offer customization options for this laptop such as RAM, storage, and color.

patterns: Is there a newer version of this smartphone available?
responses: Yes, we have released a newer version of this smartphone with improved features and performance.
